==== OpenOffice.org Calc ====

Calc is the spreadsheet tool in OpenOffice.org.

'''Test to try'''

** Open spreadsheet file from the '''Examples''' Folder.
** Try creating your own spreadsheet.
** Save and modifications and try and open the new file.
** Try and create a pie chart from the info you have added.
